description:
SUMMER VENGEANCE continues as yet another wrestler
is eliminated from the
tournament. Who gets beaten and fucked on
the mat this time?
Both wrestlers are in the lightweight class, however
the Badger has much
more mat experience. Only one can move
forward to the next round of
competition. In this match you'll see leg
scissors, complete
submissions, and some brutal arm holds. Plus some
hot hardcore
fingering and domination on
the mat. In the end, one girl loses and the winner
fucks
the shit out of her in
rd4, leaving her defeated and exhausted in a pool of
her own sweat on the
mat.
title: SUMMER VENGEANCE
